pages.title: In the End
pages.text: $(#734608)'Endless does the dragon, last of her kind, fly in vain / bearing the weight of all her world.' Translated this phrase within the log of a codex. A poem, or some kind of prayer?$()$()

$(#734608) Runes inscribed on some of the $(thing)crystals$() $(#734608)I've seen in Ender outposts seem to reference 'restoring' or 'sustaining' some kind of ancient ruined beast - that same dragon? Crystals are extremely volatile (great as remote detonation triggers!), but I haven't been able to detect any kind of healing energy or life quintessence inside them, no matter what I try.$().
